name: OnlineGuy
description:
This is an early concept for a game. Please leave a comment if you have any suggestions or criticisms. I might work on it more if there's any interest, I have many features to add. Thank you!

YOU ARE LIVING AN ONLINE LIFE

OPEN YOUR BROWSER TO READ BOOKS, PERFORM WORK, OR SHOP

YOU WIN WHEN YOU BUY THE SOFTWARE YOU NEED

START BUTTON FEATURES TEMPORARILY DISABLED. SORRY!

LEAVE A COMMENT!
